DOC.detailed_description: This study investigate quetiapine fumarate XR ( SEROQUEL XR® ) , dibenzothiazepine derivative , potential medication treat alcohol dependence . The immediate release form quetiapine fumarate , SEROQUEL XR® , approve FDA treatment schizophrenia acute manic episode associate bipolar disorder . The extended release formulation ( SEROQUEL XR® ) also approve FDA undergo clinical investigation treatment major depressive disorder , schizophrenia , generalize anxiety disorder , alcohol dependence . Treatment atypical antipsychotic clozapine olanzapine result decrease alcohol use alcohol dependent patient without comorbid psychiatric diagnosis . Quetiapine , like clozapine , appear efficacy reduce drug alcohol use among alcoholic drug dependent patient co-morbid psychiatric illness .
